Title: Sharepoint Carousel
Description:
Sharepoint Carousel\Slider is a webpart that allows you to have a carousel that contains an image with a link below it.

it is fully customisable from styles to the actual javascript that generates the slider data

it has currently only been tested with sharepoint 2010

This is carousel\slider for sharepoint is built of the JCarousel http://sorgalla.com/jcarousel/.
HomeWiki:
SPCarousel Beta has been released!!!

Follow this project for updates as their definately will be i am currently experimenting with some ideas and will be implementing them soon

Updates

****Most of the Issues have been sorted out. i am currently intergrating Lightbox functionality as the final destination of SPCarousel, shortly after that i will build a video demoing all the functionality that you can achieve by using spcarousel as it can morph very easily****
